name: Diffusal Blade
description: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

abilities.name: Inhibit
abilities.description: Greatly slows the target enemy's movement speed, which decays over the duration.
notes: The slow decays evenly over the duration in 0.8-second intervals
Can be cast on and fully affect invulnerable units
Can trigger an enemy's Linken's Sphere

abilities.name: Manabreak
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks burn their target's mana and deal damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
notes: Mana Break is a conditional attack damage bonus
The bonus attack damage is directly added to the wielder's attack damage, but is not visible in the HUD
Does not interact with percentage-based bonus attack damage, lifesteal, critical strike, cleave, or damage block sources
Does nothing if the attack target has no mana
Does not work against allied units
Does not stack with Diffusal Blade-based abilities. Stacks additively with other sources of Mana Break

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
Grants 15 attack speed and 2.5 main armor
Grants 15 and 10 main attack damage to agility/intelligence heroes respectively
Grants 11.25 main attack damage to universal heroes
Generally works well with illusion-based heroes
Heroes that can hit enemies with multiple attacks in quick succession can deal a lot of Manabreak damage
The bonus attributes and the Manabreak ability make Diffusal Blade a cost-effective damage item on agility and universal carries/heroes in general
Because of the way Manabreak interacts with illusions, Diffusal Blade is most common and most effective on heroes with easy access to them
Commonly seen together with Manta Style
The movement slow is an effective way to kite melee characters
The movement slow can help your illusions and/or summoned units stick to their attack target
